subject: Chinese word problem
body:
Dear All:
 
Question:
How come the length of
Chinese word I print shows “ 3 “.
Isn’t it supposed to 2
bytes?
 
Program:
-----------------------------------
$str=”我”;
$str_len = length($str);
Print $str_len, “\n\n”;
------------------------------------
The result is 3
 
I took a picture for the program. In case of it doesn’t
show Chinese word in some of your system,
Pls see the attachment
 
My environment:
CPU: Intel Pentium C2D
T7200
OS: Fedora Core 6
Perl V: 5.8.8
Encode: Big5
 
Thank you
